product_name: Black Diamond LiveWire Quickdraw Set - 12cm - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A deluxe sport climbing draw, the Black Diamond LiveWire Quickdraw Set features a a keylock Dynotron carabiner on top for clipping bolts and a rope-friendly LiveWire wire-gate carabiner on the bottom. Both carabiners of the Black Diamond LiveWire Quickdraw Set are hot-forged with the shapes and details needed for the demanding clips of modern sport climbing. Straightjacket insert in runner loop keeps the bottom carabiner in proper orientation for easier and more efficient clipping. Draw-friendly carabiner surface keeps runners oriented where you want them. Hooded nose protects opening end of wire gate. 12cm length. Closeout.
short_description: A deluxe sport climbing draw, the Black Diamond LiveWire Quickdraw Set features a a keylock Dynotron carabiner on top for clipping bolts and a rope-friendly LiveWire wire-gate carabiner on the bottom.
